resources.string:
Hello, dear user!!

There is no need to open this app here. To use the app: 

-C:Geo: When you want to navigate to geocache, simply select that geocache, click Navigate and select Pebble! 

 - Geocaching official app: Select Radar and pick Pebble Navigator

-Locus: Select Menu->More->Share and select Pebble Navigator

To close the Pebble Navigation, click on notification on top.

Of couse, you must have application installed on Pebble as well! Please read description or view video on Google Play for more info.
Click here to stop the app!
